name: Pet Food
description:
Create custom pets for customers... with a twist!

Use the arrow buttons to select parts, then press the finalize button to begin the delivery process. Click or press spacebar to set your power level, then click the "throw" button to deliver the pet to your customer.

Credits: Character art by Elyot Lamb Programming by Jonathan Carewick Programming and additional art by Jacob Carewick

Music: “Android Sock Hop” Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com) Licensed under Creative Commons: By Attribution 3.0 License http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/3.0/

“Robobozo” Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com) Licensed under Creative Commons: By Attribution 3.0 Licensehttp://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/3.0/

Skybox: AvionX Skybox Series Free https://assetstore.unity.com/publishers/31837

Created for LD41, theme "Combine 2 incompatible genres." We combined 2 incompatible concepts, pets, and eating.
